title: When the screen goes to sleep, will Wi-Fi operations be interrupted?
answer:
Configure your phone to keep Wi-Fi awake during sleep: 

 Step 1 On the Settings screen, select Wi-Fi. 

 Step 1 Open the options menu, and select Advanced (EMUI 2.0 or EMUI 2.3) or Advanced settings (EMUI 3.0) to enter the advanced Wi-Fi settings screen. 

 Step 1 Select Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep and then select Always.
keywords: keep mobile data turned on, sleep, screen timeout, blank screen
